steps.content:
{
  "title": "Become a Pilot",
  "advice": "Step 1: Meet basic requirements (age, education, medical)
Get an FAA medical certificate
Step 2: Find a flight school and program
Enroll in a certified pilot training program
Step 3: Learn aircraft systems and safety procedures
Complete ground school and simulator training
Step 4: Log flight hours and build experience
Train in a variety of aircraft types
Step 5: Pass the FAA written exam
Take a commercial pilot license (CPL) course
Step 6: Build instrument rating skills
Train for IFR flying and instrument training
Step 7: Gain multi-engine rating experience
Train on twin-engine aircraft
Step 8: Practice cross-country flying
Fly to various airports and routes
Step 9: Prepare for the ATP exam
Study for and take the Airline Transport Pilot (ATP) test
Step 10: Build a pilot resume and apply for jobs
Network with other pilots and airlines"
